Name: Pablo Alvarez de Cañas Special
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Prepare garnish of skewered pineapple cubes, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry and orange slice..
REGAL SHAKE all ingredients (including lemon zest).
Review: Sherry is most prevalent on the palate, but all the other ingredients, including the lemon zest, also contribute to this subtle, balanced and altogether a most unusual cocktail.
History: Recipe adapted from 1937 Bar Florida (later renamed Floridita) menu, Havana, Cuba.
